channel.title: Christmas - earlier every year
channel.description:
It's that time of year again! Is everyone ready to get into the festive spirit?
On a similar note, my dad has asked me what I want for christmas, wat da fuk do I say? ideas go go

item.title: Christmas - earlier every year
item.dc:creator: @sspoke sspoke
item.description:
@sspoke wrote:

same boat as Ollie, making over a thousand dollars a day from your computer, you really don’t need anything materialistic but partying.

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas - earlier every year
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:3, topic:421942”]Ditto… but my parents are going away to mexico for 2 weeks and said I could go for my present, which I kindly declined. Too old for family holidays now, so my dad feels obliged to get me something worth of value. Problem is because I have made so much money in the past year I have bought everything, new 3D TV, macbook, XBOX, Amplifier, Speakers, Subwoofer, iPhone, iPod, shit loads of blu-ray & dvd and cloths.

all I can think of is maybe ask for some money towards a holiday?

p.s. fuck the festive season, its shit.[/quote]I concur, fuck christmas.

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas - earlier every year
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

Travel voucher.
New camera (it’s a fun hobby that i’ve only just started).
Alcohol.
Money.

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas - earlier every year
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Ditto… but my parents are going away to mexico for 2 weeks and said I could go for my present, which I kindly declined. Too old for family holidays now, so my dad feels obliged to get me something worth of value. Problem is because I have made so much money in the past year I have bought everything, new 3D TV, macbook, XBOX, Amplifier, Speakers, Subwoofer, iPhone, iPod, shit loads of blu-ray & dvd and cloths.

all I can think of is maybe ask for some money towards a holiday?

p.s. fuck the festive season, its shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas - earlier every year
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Booze of course. I myself have nothing whatsoever to ask for this christmas, i already have everything i want.
